txt.en:
You have retrieved a piece of paper written by the hand of a Hillman. As you read the scrap of paper, it becomes clear that you have waylaid a messenger of Angmar.

'...the Trév Gállorg have become too strong for us to deal with alone. The southrons have sent heroes to help them. We humbly ask to form an alliance with Angmar and the Trév Duvárdain....'

Reading this grave news, it becomes clear that this must be shown to someone in Gath Forthnír immediately.

'The Trév Duvardain have long been a thorn in the side of our allies here, the Trév Gallorg. If they have come hither to establish a stronger alliance with the Iron Crown, our efforts here may be doomed.

'You have done well by defeating the messenger, but I fear it will not be enough.

'I think I have a plan....'
'I am sorry. I would help you if I could, but without the parchment you have spoken of, there is little I can do.'
You have found a scrap of paper indicating that the Hillman-tribe called the Trév Duvárdain and Angmar seek to strengthen their alliance.
Talk to someone at Gath Forthnír who might know something about these pledges.

Gath Forthnír lies in the eastern reaches of Angmar, beyond Rammas Deluon.\n\nYou have acquired information about Angmar's allies and plans. You should immediately inform someone at Gath Forthnír of this development.
